newsitem.title: INDIA: Yield on Indian 91-day t-bill steady at 10.20 pct.
newsitem.headline: Yield on Indian 91-day t-bill steady at 10.20 pct.

text.p: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) said it maintained a cut-off price of 97.52 rupees at its weekly 91-day treasury bills auction on Friday.
Traders said the yield worked out to 10.20 percent.
The RBI said it accepted 12 of 17 competitive bids for 2.7 billion rupees and one non-competitive bid for 2.0 billion.
The devolvement on the RBI was 259.2 million rupees and that on the primary dealers was 40.8 million rupees.
The weighted average price at the auction was 97.53 rupees.
